mean_cn: n. (用于检验、分析的) 试样，样品；  adj.样品的，作为例子的；  vt.抽样检查；抽取……的试样
mean_en: a small amount of a substance taken from a larger amount and tested in order to obtain information about the substance
sentence: I'll need a sample of your blood to see if you're sick.
sentence_trans: 我需要你的血样来确定你是不是生病了。
word_etyma: s分开 + ample拿 → 分开拿出 → sample标本
